question.title: How can I reference the attributes (x, y, height, width) of widgets from other fragments?
question.body:
I am making an game in Android Studio using Java. There is a RelativeLayout in activity_main.xml called "top_bar", which contains elements like balance and progress bars (Energy, Satisfaction), and a BottomNavigationView. I want to keep the top_bar and the bottom navigation bar visible on every fragment, and make the page bounds from the top of the bottom navigation bar to the bottom of the top_bar. Under the top_bar in each individual fragment, I want to add a colored rectangle with the current page's title, however to do that, I need to somehow reference the bottom of top_bar to the top of the colored title rectangle. I will also need to change each fragment's layout's boundaries to be between the top and bottom bars.

Top Bar in activity_main.xml. Relative layout is within a Constraint layout.

<RelativeLayout
        android:id="@+id/top_bar"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="60dp"
        android:background="#FFFFFF"
        android:backgroundTint="#303030"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">

        <Button
            android:id="@+id/bal_container"
            style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_alignTop="@id/energy_bar"
            android:layout_alignBottom="@id/satisfaction_bar"
            android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
            android:layout_marginStart="10dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="0dp"
            android:layout_marginBottom="0dp"
            android:background="@drawable/roundedbutton"
            android:checkable="false"
            android:clickable="false"
            android:contextClickable="false"
            android:enabled="false"
            android:focusable="false"
            android:focusableInTouchMode="false"
            tools:ignore="RelativeOverlap" />

        <ProgressBar
            android:id="@+id/energy_bar"
            style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal"
            android:layout_width="72dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
            android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
            android:layout_marginEnd="10dp"
            android:layout_marginBottom="0dp"
            android:focusable="false"
            android:indeterminate="false"
            android:max="200"
            android:progress="150"
            android:progressBackgroundTint="#CCCCCC"
            android:progressTint="#FFEE33"
            android:scaleY="3.9" />

        <ProgressBar
            android:id="@+id/satisfaction_bar"
            style="?android:attr/progressBarStyleHorizontal"
            android:layout_width="72dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
            android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
            android:layout_marginEnd="10dp"
            android:layout_marginBottom="10dp"
            android:focusable="false"
            android:indeterminate="false"
            android:max="1000"
            android:progress="750"
            android:progressBackgroundTint="#CCCCCC"
            android:progressTint="#1AB31A"
            android:scaleY="3.9" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/satisfaction_lbl"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_alignStart="@id/satisfaction_bar"
            android:layout_alignTop="@id/satisfaction_bar"
            android:layout_alignEnd="@id/satisfaction_bar"
            android:layout_alignBottom="@id/satisfaction_bar"
            android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black"
            android:gravity="center"
            android:text="[750/1000]"
            android:textSize="11sp" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/energy_lbl"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_alignStart="@id/energy_bar"
            android:layout_alignTop="@id/energy_bar"
            android:layout_alignEnd="@id/energy_bar"
            android:layout_marginTop="2dp"
            android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black"
            android:gravity="center"
            android:text="[150/200]"
            android:textSize="11sp" />
    </RelativeLayout>

Title (no rectangle yet) in fragment_profile.xml that needs to be placed under the top_bar. Also within a constraint layout.

<TextView
        android:id="@+id/screen_title"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/title_profile"
        android:textAlignment="center"
        android:textSize="24sp"

        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"/>
